definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Rinse fresh lotus seeds, soak in hot water until soft, remove piths .
sentences.chinese: 鮮蓮子沖水，加入滾水浸至軟身，去芯。

sentences.english: So instead, they plant lotus seeds on raised beds.
sentences.chinese: 因此他們在升高的河牀上種植蓮子。

sentences.english: The lotus seeds could be collected to make cakes or buns .
sentences.chinese: 蓮子採摘後可以用來做餅或包。

sentences.english: The water-holding capacity of protein freeze-dried power reached highest at 50℃.
sentences.chinese: 蓮子蛋白持水力在50℃時達最大值。

sentences.english: I'll tell you how to make this lotus seed into a lotus pond.
sentences.chinese: 一會兒，我將告訴你們怎樣將一粒蓮子變成一片荷塘。

sentences.english: Add lye water into lotus seeds, mix wellleave aside for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在蓮子中加入鹼水，混合均勻放置20分鐘。

sentences.english: This is my first time to see fresh lotus seed. The peddler is hawking.
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次看見新鮮的蓮子，小商販正圍車叫賣。

sentences.english: Strain and wash the lotus seeds to remove the skin.
There are bright yellow for many of the lotus.
sentences.chinese: 裏面都是一顆顆嫩黃色的蓮子。

sentences.english: Add lye water into lotus seeds, mix well and leave aside for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在蓮子中加入鹼水，混合均勻放置20分鐘。

sentences.english: Results Phenolated alkaloids could markedly increase the threshold dosage of ventricular extrasystole, ventricular fibrillation(VF) and .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蓮子心酚性生物鹼抗心律失常的藥理作用。

sentences.english: The soup is delicious, lotus seeds and edible fungus soft and delicious, is a kind of taste.
sentences.chinese: 湯味鮮美，蓮子和木耳柔軟可口，是一種味覺的享受。

sentences.english: Lotus seed chicken, Carrots sauteed mushrooms , rice, Yimi porridge.
sentences.chinese: 蓮子雞丁，胡蘿蔔炒蘑菇，米飯，薏米粥。

sentences.english: But it will not die, either.
So allelopathy of A. philoxeroides Griseb was one of potential causes of successful invasion.
sentences.chinese: 空心蓮子草的化感作用可能是其成功入侵的機制之一。

sentences.english: Can you smell smell smell lotus seed, soil buried sweet lotus.
sentences.chinese: 你能聞到蓮子氣息，聞到泥土裏埋着的甜藕。
